title: Sotek Logo
content:
Hello everyone,  
Any help identifying this typeface would be great.  
Thanks!

author: jennaarmstrong

comments.content: It is a mix of typefaces. The S comes from Slogan or Charme, the o is a circle, the rest is some chancery like Apple Chancery or Lucida Calligraphy, donâ€™t know the exact one.
